full_summary:
# Solicitation Announcement for Scaping and Painting of DFO Lighthouse in Bic/Gaspé, Ile-Bicquette (QC)
## Solicitation Number: 30004385
## Amendment Number: 3
## Publication Date: 2023-07-21
## Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-11T14:00:00
## Solicitation Status: Expired

## Overview
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) has issued an invitation to tender for a contract to refurbish the exterior of the DFO lighthouse located on Bicquette Island, in the province of Quebec.

## Project Details
- **Project Title:** Scaping and Painting of DFO Lighthouse
- **Location:** Bic/Gaspé, Ile-Bicquette (QC)
- **Duration of Contract:** August 14, 2023 to November 1, 2023

## Scope of Work
The project involves the removal of old paint and the application of new paint on the exterior of the lighthouse, as well as the installation of new metal rings around the building, the restoration of the entrance door, and the replacement of the door locking mechanism.

## Requirements
The selected contractor must possess the follow physical attributes to execute the project:
- Possess necessary equipment and materials to perform the required tasks.
- Contribute to environmental sustainability through responsible waste management practices.
- Meet the required occupational health and safety standards.
- Supply necessary documentation to demonstrate compliance with regulations.

## Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be the governing factor in the awarding of the contract.

## Description of Goods and Services
Renovation and painting of the exterior of the lighthouse, as well as the installation of new metal rings on the exterior.

## Relevant Documents
- Solicitation Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
- Solicitation documents and all supporting materials may be obtained from the Government Electronic Tender Services and from the West Baffin contract office.
- One (1) paper copy of the solicitation document in volume, signed by the qualified Vendor.
- Mandatory documentation to be submitted to the contracting officer through the Standard Bid Solicitation System, approved in the contract transactions section.

## Contract Administration
Inquiries regarding this solicitation should be directed to the contracting officer listed below.

## Contracting Officer Information
- **Name:** Gloria Tsaka Kipuni
- **Phone Number:** 343-598-4182
- **Email Address:** DFO.tenders-soumissions
